Functions¶

app_folder.routes.hello()¶

This function will greet the user.

This will greet the user with their username after they login

app_folder.routes.login()¶

This is the Login function.

This function checks if username and password is valid

app_folder.routes.logout()¶

This is the Logout function.

This function will logout the user

app_folder.routes.register()¶

This is the Register function.

This function create and stores the username and password into database.

class app_folder.forms.LoginForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

Thise is the Login Form function.

This function creates a form with username, password, and the ability to remember user

class app_folder.forms.RegisterForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

This is the Register Form function.

This function allows the user to create a form with username, email, and passwords

validate_email(email)¶

This function validates the users email.

This will check if the email is in the database

validate_username(username)¶

This function validates the users username.

This will check if the user name is in the database
